Eurotunnel.translation[0].definitions[0]: a British and French company which is responsible for repairing and maintaining the structure of the Channel Tunnel, and for operating the train service through the tunnel
Eurotunnel.translation[1].definitions[0]: the company that operates the CHANNEL TUNNEL, or the tunnel itself
